message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product. I think you'll really appreciate its quality and features. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $175?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I have to make sure I get a fair price for it. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $175 and $200. How about $187.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $187.50 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $180?
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to go down to $180. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $182.50?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $180 again?
